title: Bun/TypeScript core for Ralph
description: Create the TypeScript core modules that both bash wrapper and React Ink UI can use. Shared logic for config, models, costs, and story management.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Create core/costs.ts - cost tracking to costs.jsonl
Create core/claude.ts - spawn Claude CLI with prompt
Add unit tests for each core module
Test: Core modules work standalone with Bun
Run CodeRabbit review - must pass (or create BUG if unfixable)
